exceptions.exn: In environment a, b : Z H : b > 0 Unable to unify "(Z.pos ?M1837 ?= 0) = Gt" with "(match match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x' => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end with | 0 => match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x' => match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end | Z.pos x' => match match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x'0 => match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') end | Z.neg x'0 => match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') end end with | 0 => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x'0 => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') end | Z.neg x'0 => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') end end | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x'0 => match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') end | Z.neg x'0 => match b with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') end end with | 0 => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos x'0 => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') end | Z.neg x'0 => match a with | 0 => 0 | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x'0 * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x'0 * y') end end | Z.pos y' => Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end ?= 0) = Gt".
